Cocokind Organic Facial Cleansing Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: Cocokind

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: COCOS (COCONUT) NUCIFERA OIL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL.

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: COCOS (COCONUT) NUCIFERA OIL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
